title: New: Nicolas Jaar & Theatre Roosevelt – The Ego
body: “**_The American people aren’t buying what he’s selling the people_**” – the opening line to **[Nicolas Jaar](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13688-new-nicolas-jaar-with-just-one-glance-you-feat-scout-larue/ "New: Nicolas Jaar – With Just One Glance You (Feat. Scout Larue)")**’s surprisingly upbeat, almost tropical new jam. I’d like to make it clear that there’s no way I would have spotted that if **Pitchfork** hadn’t noticed it earlier today, I guess there is a benefit to **P4K** premiering EVERYTHING first. Anyway, as it’s Black Friday it becomes a clear assault on the most odious day of the year. Away from that, we’re left with a vibrating, syncopated, synth-laden and ultimately fun little jam. Enjoy.

I’d like to make it clear that there’s no way I would have spotted that if Pitchfork hadn’t noticed it earlier today, I guess there is a benefit to P4K premiering EVERYTHING \[…\]
